name: Oil Run
description:
Description:

In this game you are in a desert where you have to dig up as much oil as possible before you run out of water and die from dehydration. Your score will be the money you made from digging up oil. You can get more water by drinking from a cactus or oasis.

Controls:

E- drink from a cactus

E- drink from an oasis

LMB- dig up oil
